verbs.description: [ARG1: person] [V: dies] [ARGM-TMP: after being struck by a truck in west haven] a person was hit by a truck and killed in west haven sunday night police responded to first avenue just north of center street on calls of a hit and run police said that the truck involved was traveling north on first avenue when it struck both the person and utility pole west haven connecticut west haven
